post.title: motorola droid, env touch, or motorola devour
post.content: motorola droid, env touch, or motorola devour of these three phones i just wanted to know a couple questions 1. can these phones be fully flashed to ntelos (mms and internet)? 2. will i need a data/smartphone plan for any of these phones? 3. which of the three phones are better? help is much appreciated!
